document.full_text: avastin, a cancer drug made by roche holding ag, was about as effective as the company's far more expensive eye drug, lucentis, at preventing vision loss in people with age-related macular degeneration, the new york times reported on wednesday.
document.title: cheaper roche drug as good as lucentis: report
lines_and_colors: avastin, a cancer drug made by roche holding ag, was about as effective as the company's far more expensive eye drug, lucentis, at preventing vision loss in people with age-related macular degeneration, the new york times reported on wednesday.
